evidence.claim: ComForCare adheres to HIPAA regulations for patient privacy and data security.
The company utilizes electronic data interchange (EDI) for efficient billing and claims processing.
ComForCare implements FHIR standards for exchanging health information.
Details on their security practices are mentioned, demonstrating an understanding of health-tech compliance needs.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found linking company to X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
